channel.title: Maternity records BiB pregnancy on Born in Bradford Data Dictionary
channel.description: Recent content in Maternity records BiB pregnancy on Born in Bradford Data Dictionary

item.title: Maternity records admissions
item.description: Table ID: BiB_Pregnancy.matrecs_bib_admiss github | csv Entity type Variables Entities Updated Participant 17 813 2022-09-30 This source contains information about hospital admissions during the maternal period. 80 observations were dropped due to missing data or data entry errors. variable label value_type summary BiBPregNumber decimal mean (sd) 1.10 (0.32) min < median < max

item.title: Maternity records pregnancy blood pressure
item.description: Table ID: BiB_Pregnancy.matrecs_bib_pregbp github | csv Entity type Variables Entities Updated Participant 8 10005 2022-09-30 This source contains information about blood pressure during the BiB pregnancy. 940 observations were dropped due to data entry errors. variable label value_type summary BiBPregNumber Cohort recruited pregnancy number decimal mean (sd) 1.09 (0.29) min < median < max

item.title: Maternity records labour blood pressure
item.description: Table ID: BiB_Pregnancy.matrecs_bib_labbp github | csv Entity type Variables Entities Updated Participant 8 7995 2022-09-30 This source contains information about blood pressure during labour for the BiB pregnancy. 1913 observations were dropped due to data entry errors. variable label value_type summary BiBPregNumber decimal mean (sd) 1.08 (0.28) min < median < max

item.title: Maternity records post-partum blood pressure
item.description: Table ID: BiB_Pregnancy.matrecs_bib_postbp github | csv Entity type Variables Entities Updated Participant 7 9292 2022-09-30 This source contains information about blood pressure taken postpartum for the BiB pregnancy. 907 observations were dropped due to data entry errors. variable label value_type summary BiBPregNumber Cohort recruited pregnancy number decimal mean (sd) 1.08 (0.28) min < median < max

item.title: Maternity records medications
item.description: Table ID: BiB_Pregnancy.matrecs_bib_meds github | csv Entity type Variables Entities Updated Participant 6 3664 2022-09-30 This source contains information about medications taken during the BiB pregnancy. variable label value_type summary BiBPregNumber Cohort recruited pregnancy number decimal mean (sd) 1.09 (0.29) min < median < max 1.00 < 1.00 < 3.00 Complete: 4937 (100.00%)

item.title: Maternity records oedema
item.description: Table ID: BiB_Pregnancy.matrecs_bib_oedema github | csv Entity type Variables Entities Updated Participant 12 3151 2022-09-30 This source contains information about oedema events during the BiB pregnancy. 47 cases were dropped due to data entry errors. variable label value_type summary BiBPregNumber Cohort recruited pregnancy number decimal mean (sd) 1.07 (0.26) min < median < max

item.title: Maternity records proteinuria
item.description: Table ID: BiB_Pregnancy.matrecs_bib_proteinuria github | csv Entity type Variables Entities Updated Participant 7 6918 2022-09-30 This source contains information about proteinuria observations during the BiB pregnancy. variable label value_type summary BiBPregNumber Cohort recruited pregnancy number decimal mean (sd) 1.10 (0.31) min < median < max 1.00 < 1.00 < 3.00 Complete: 17300 (100.00%)
